issue.title: [Rust] - Stream reader fail when steam not ended with (optional) 0xFFFFFFFF 0x00000000"
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9082](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9082). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
according to spec : <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/format/Columnar.html#ipc-streaming-format> , the 0xFFFFFFFF 0x00000000 is optional in the arrow response stream , but currently when client receive such response it's read all the batches well , but return an error  in the end (instead of Ok(None))
